sent.orig: Asking your father to pay your debts isn't quite the thing, especially after he's already given you what should have been enough for all your needs.
sent.trans: 要求你父亲替你还债不合适，尤其是在他满足了你所有的要求以后。

sent.orig: Save your breath!Don't even mention your illness to your unsympathetic boss.
sent.trans: 省点力气吧！甚至别对你那位没有同情心的老板提及你生病的事。

sent.orig: Your teacher will take your recent illness into consideration when judging your examination results.
sent.trans: 老师评考分时肯定会考虑你最近生病的情况的。

sent.orig: "The wife of your father's brother" is a circumlocution for "your aunt".
sent.trans: “你爸爸的兄弟的妻子”是“你婶子”的累赘的说法。

sent.orig: All your faculties have come into play in your work.
sent.trans: 在你的工作中，你的全部才能已起到了作用。
